title: macos: Resource limit exceeded errors since clustered decals

labels.name: A-Rendering
labels.description: Drawing game state to the screen

labels.name: O-MacOS
labels.description: Specific to the MacOS (Apple) desktop operating system

body:
## Bevy version

main, bisected to fc831c390d565d4a0111c3ab5d4ea84183800007

## Relevant system information

SystemInfo { os: "macOS 14.5 Sonoma", kernel: "23.5.0", cpu: "Apple M1 Max", core_count: "10", memory: "64.0 GiB" }    
AdapterInfo { name: "Apple M1 Max", vendor: 0, device: 0, device_type: IntegratedGpu, driver: "", driver_info: "", backend: Metal }

(Also failing on GH macos runner)

## What you did

Some fancier rendering examples are crashing. This may not be exhaustive, but these are the ones that failed in CI.

`cargo run --example depth_of_field`
`cargo run --example mixed_lighting`
`cargo run --example lightmaps`
